title: Can I just download league of legend my upload speed is slow.
body: How much GB does it take for it to load? I really want to play it for the first time. :(

replies.body:
Downloading League of Legends is impacted by your download speed, not your upload speed. Your upload speed impacts your in-game stability.

The client is ~6 GB.

Are you seeing any errors when trying to patch League or is it just taking quite a while? Depending on your download speed to the server, it could take up to a few hours. Let me know if you run into any issues and I'll be glad to help out.
